name: twistcli-scan
description: Task to scan container images using twistcli within Azure DevOps Build & Release pipelines
author: Mario Weigel

inputs.name: twistlockService
inputs.label: Twistlock service/server end point
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Twistlock end point to use. If needed, click on 'manage', and add a new service endpoint of type 'Twistlock server connection'

inputs.name: vulnerabilityThreshold
inputs.label: Vulnerability Threshold
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select minimum vulnerability threshold for failing the build on vulnerability checks

inputs.name: onlyFixed
inputs.label: Only Fixed
inputs.helpMarkDown: Include only vulnerabilities with a fix

inputs.name: gracePeriod
inputs.label: Grace Period
inputs.helpMarkDown: Grace period specifies the timeframe for which a vulnerability should be ignored (measured in days from first vendor publish)

inputs.name: complianceThreshold
inputs.label: Compliance Threshold
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select minimum compliance threshold for failing the build on compliance checks

inputs.name: image
inputs.label: Image
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID or name of the image to scan
